Carlos R. Mendoza

I've always had a passion for learning, teaching, creating, and technology. This blog documents some of my key learnings as a Software Developer. I know a lot of JavaScript; thus, I am very familiar with some of its derived technologies, including AngularJS, Node.js, and MongoDB. I guess you can call me a Full Stack Developer. I am also known to delve into other platforms from time to time.
